title: Stunning Street Level 1.5-bed, deck, with South End Charm
posting_body: •	Highly sought-after South End location on Wellington Street, Street level apartment with its own private entrance;
it
is approx.
Ft. in size, with high ceilings
•	Beautifully maintained property w/ flower boxes and original wrought iron finishes, exposed brick on some interior
•	Wide entry good for storing shoes and a small bench, coat hangers etc
•	Well-appointed kitchen w/ breakfast bar, dishwasher, gas stove and fridge/freezer
•	Two large street facing windows in the living room with plenty of room for large sectional couch
•	Central A/C and heating with thermostat in unit, for tenant to adjust to their needs
•	The bedroom offers exposed brick finishes, large walk-in closet, and a separate half bedroom, which can serve as an
office.
Alternatively, some tenants use the half bedroom for sleeping leaving the larger bedroom for office space
(WFH possibilities)
•	Bedroom has a door access to private wrought iron deck overlooking the alley, parking spot, and rear patio.
This off
street parking carries a separate charge
•	Full sized bathroom with large vanity and medicine cabinet and tub/shower combo
•	Free use of laundry in lower level!
•	Pet-friendly unit
•	Sept. 1st move-in date
•	Heat, Hot water, and Gas included in the rent.
No brokers fees, only first month and security deposit due at signing
•	Landlord lives upstairs, only a phone call away!
